Class Lab2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lab2

  • public class Lab2
extends Object
    This program goes through a text file representing a list of students and their grades, store the data in an array of Grades objects, calculates for each student avg, median, max grade, and min grade, and prints out all of those data in a formated way.
    Author:
    Paul Szyller

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        The main method starts the java application.
        This method sets up a new Scanner, scans every data in the file "data.txt", and stores everything in a Grades array.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • addStudent

        public static Grades[] addStudent(Grades[] students,
                  String name,
                  int numOfStudents)
        This method creates a new Grades object for student "name" in the students array.
        Parameters:
        students - Array of Grades objects.
        name - Name of the student to create a Grades object for.
        numOfStudents - Current number of students in the students array.
        Returns:
        The updated students array.

      • testGrades

        public static void testGrades(Grades grades)
        Method from the lab2 rubric, prints out a student's data.
        Parameters:
        grades - The Grades object corresponding to the student whose data are being printed.

      • printGrades

        public static void printGrades(Grades[] students,
               int numberOfStudents)
        Method to print the final formated list of students and their data.
        Parameters:
        students - Array of Grades object.
        numberOfStudents - Current number of students.
